What is the purpose of the `rescanfromheight` command in Verus, and how do I use it?

The `rescanfromheight` command is used to rescan the current wallet from a specified height. This command can be used to initiate a rescan of the entire chain or from a specific block height. To use this command, you can run `verus rescanfromheight` to rescan the entire chain, or `verus rescanfromheight <height>` to rescan from a specific block height, replacing `<height>` with the desired block number.

rescanfromheight (height)

Rescans the current wallet from a specified height

Arguments:
1. "height"   (int, optional) Defaults to 0, height to start rescanning from

Note: This call can take minutes or even hours to complete on very large wallets and rescans

Examples:

Initiate rescan of entire chain
> verus rescanfromheight

Initiate rescan from block 1000000
> verus rescanfromheight 1000000
What is the default height that `rescanfromheight` starts scanning from if I don't specify a height?
If you don't specify a height when using the `rescanfromheight` command, it will default to 0, which means it will start rescanning from the beginning of the chain.

rescanfromheight (height)

Rescans the current wallet from a specified height

Arguments:
1. "height"   (int, optional) Defaults to 0, height to start rescanning from

Note: This call can take minutes or even hours to complete on very large wallets and rescans

Examples:

Initiate rescan of entire chain
> verus rescanfromheight

Initiate rescan from block 1000000
> verus rescanfromheight 1000000
How long does it take to complete a rescan using `rescanfromheight`, and what factors affect the duration?

The time it takes to complete a rescan using `rescanfromheight` can vary depending on the size of the wallet and the height of the rescan. On very large wallets and rescans, it can take minutes or even hours to complete. The duration is affected by the size of the wallet and the height of the rescan, with larger wallets and higher rescans taking longer to complete.

rescanfromheight (height)

Rescans the current wallet from a specified height

Arguments:
